DOC.brief_summary: Accurate assessment size follicle important IVF treatment.Timing oocyte maturation subsequent egg collection largely base follicle size . An accurate assessment follicle size appropriate timing HCG result retrieval mature oocytes , improve fertilization high pregnancy rate . 3D technology- fter capture 3D image ovary , SonoAVC automatically analyze volume dataset , identifies boundary hypoechoic follicle , provide estimate absolute dimension . These measurement include large diameter three orthogonal plane , mean follicular diameter ( MFD ) , volume follicle , volume-based diameter ( ( V ) ) follicle . In current study investigator aim evaluate use automate technique follicle measurement vs. standard 2D technology time oocyte maturation subsequent oocyte retrieval . The investigator speculate 3D assessment increase rate mature oocyte collection , eventually improve treatment outcome fertilization rate .
DOC.brief_title: Automated 3D ( SonoAVC ) Versus 2D Ovarian Follicles Assessment IVF Cycles : Randomized Controlled Trial
